commit.message:
re PR target/62247 (FAIL: g++.dg/abi/anon3.C  -std=c++98/9  scan-assembler .weak(_definition))

	PR target/62247
	* g++.dg/abi/anon3.C: Skip failing scan-assembler checks on
	hppa*-*-hpux*.
	* g++.dg/abi/rtti3.C: Likewise.

From-SVN: r221271

files.patch:
@@ -1,5 +1,10 @@

+	* g++.dg/abi/rtti3.C: Likewise.
